Authentication failed, check your credentials or sign up
Is a geo location based augmented reality application submitted as partial fulfilment of the Newcastle University MSc E-Business (Information Systems) degree.
Using sensors embedded in the mobile device and satellites in space, the application calculates GPS co-ordinates to pin point a users location and
overlays geo-location specific information of real world objects at the users current position and surroundings over a camera view
from external service providers in real-time from their respective data servers such as Urban Observatory who have deployed a range of sensors around the city that record various conditions.

"Introduction.

"
"Once again I would like to thank you for taking part in the review of this prototype." "My name is Masitano Sichone and I am pursuing a Masters degree in E-Business (Information Systems) and " "the prototype that you have just used is part of the artefact's of my dissertation. 

" "The survey seeks the views of everyday people with regards to Augmented Reality as a technology, " "the dissemination of digital information from providers to consumers and the issues and challenges faced in doing so. 

" "The results of the survey will make a great contribution towards both academia and industry and you are encouraged to " "respond to all the questions to the best of your knowledge bearing in mind that your responses are confidential and will be anonymized. 

" "Access to the survey and any other application data is restricted to the researcher and supervision team. 

" "Please feel free to contact me on m.k.p.sichone2@newcastle.ac.uk for any questions or comments. 

 "
